trans-unit.source: Contains classes that support interoperation of Windows Forms and WPF controls.
trans-unit.target: Contiene classi che supportano l'interoperatività dei controlli Windows Form e WPF.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> namespace contains classes that enable interoperation between the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] technologies.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> dello spazio dei nomi contiene classi che consentono l'interazione tra il [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] tecnologie.

trans-unit.source: When you use <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classes, you can host [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] controls on [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pages, and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elements in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based applications.
trans-unit.target: Quando si utilizza <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration> classi, è possibile ospitare [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] ai controlli [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] , pagine e [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elementi [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazioni basate su.

trans-unit.source: The two key classes that implement interoperation capabilities are <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.
trans-unit.target: Le due classi principali che implementano funzionalità di interoperabilità sono <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost>.

trans-unit.source: Which class you use depends on your control implementation:
trans-unit.target: La classe da utilizzare dipende dall'implementazione del controllo:

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control on a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] page.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.WindowsFormsHost> classe quando è necessario utilizzare un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)] control per un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] pagina.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> class when you must use a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] element in a [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-based application.
trans-unit.target: Utilizzare il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.Integration.ElementHost> classe quando è necessario utilizzare un [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] elemento in un [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winforms](~/includes/tlasharptla-winforms-md.md)]-applicazione basata su.
